snippet.title: Starfield: Official Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Starfield is the first new universe in 25 years from Bethesda Game Studios, the award-winning creators of The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim and Fallout 4. In this next generation role-playing game set amongst the stars, create any character you want and explore with unparalleled freedom as you embark on an epic journey to answer humanity’s greatest mystery.

Starfield arrives exclusively on Xbox Series X|S and PC in 2023. Play it day one with Xbox Game Pass. Become a member of Constellation at StarfieldGame.com and be among the first to receive Starfield news and updates.

--

Visit https://starfieldgame.com/ and follow Starfield on social media: 
Official Site – https://starfieldgame.com/ 
Discord – https://discord.gg/bethesdastudios
 Facebook – https://www.facebook.com/StarfieldGame/ 
Twitter – https://twitter.com/starfieldgame 
Instagram – https://instagram.com/starfieldgame 
Twitch – https://www.twitch.tv/bethesda
